explains: v. 控告，指控；指责，谴责，归咎于

sentences.en: He laughs loudly when I accuse him of fibbing.
sentences.cn: 我指控他撒谎时，他笑得很大声。

sentences.en: His father would accuse him of neglecting his filial duties.
sentences.cn: 他父亲会指控他没有尽孝。

sentences.en: Politicians accuse the media of talking up the possibility of a riot.
sentences.cn: 政客们谴责媒体夸大骚乱的可能性。
